refbody.section: PurposeDisplay the status of one or more network interfaces.

dlentry.dd: If specified, displays the status of a network interface name, such as eth0

section.title: Example
section.codeblock: Console> netconf status 1: lo: <LOOPBACK,UP,LOWER_UP> mtu 16436 qdisc noqueue state UNKNOWN link/loopback 00:00:00:00:00:00 brd 00:00:00:00:00:00 inet 127.0.0.1/8 scope host lo inet6 ::1/128 scope host valid_lft forever preferred_lft forever 2: gre0: <NOARP> mtu 1476 qdisc noop state DOWN link/gre 0.0.0.0 brd 0.0.0.0 ...
